metamodel.description:
Check this to generate data models on leading frameworks.
This Data Metamodel allows to model Application Object structure and persistence.
SIDE provides the modeler to graphically produce data models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR500 Data

technology.description:
Check this to generate your Data models on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution.
SIDE allows to optimize the configuration of the Alfresco content model, views, forms and reports.
technology.name: Alfresco

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate data models on the major release 3 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.4.b is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution.
Additionally to content generation, SIDE provides useful server components to enhance some features of this release.

generatorVersion.version: SIDE Content Model Generator for Alfresco community

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the URL of the Alfresco instance on which you want to generate and deploy this new content model from the SIDE data model.
configurationParameter.label: Alfresco URL

configurationParameter.documentation: account to use when getting documents from alfresco
configurationParameter.label: report as

option.documentation:
Check this option to include the SIDE SQL extension module for Alfresco.
This module provides the synchronisation of alfresco data into a relational database.
Queries with joins can thus be performed.
option.label: Alfresco SQL

option.documentation: Generates random data regarding the current Alfresco model. The generated ACP can be imported and reused accross various Alfresco installations.
option.label: Alfresco Random Data Generator

option.documentation: additional module to check if created/updated items already exist; in this case the update or creation is forbidden
option.label: Content Uniqueness

option.documentation: this api use alfresco web-services-client to contact alfresco and do CRUD actions
option.label: Java webservice API

option.documentation: this api use alfresco Embedded SDK, and allow webscript to use it
option.label: Java Embedded API
